alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 11:11PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...URBAN & SMALL STREAM FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CHST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Entire island of Guam. * WHEN...Until 315 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1109 PM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.8 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
